Name: Apperception
About the game: Apperception is a survival horror virtual reality experience in which you must hide from the grotesque monsters that wonder the halls of The Tower. Make your way through the cursed regions to find your freedom. Use the environment to distract them in order to find passage all the while lighting your way with makeshift torches. Complete unfinished rituals, solve puzzles and avoid the damned that lurk in the darkness.
